title: [Library Aies, Hall of Magic]
description: Silvery grey marble gleams across the floor, shimmering slightly in the light cast from a glaesine chandelier suspended above.  Tall ebonwood bookcases line the walls of this circular room, lined with volumes both thick and thin.  A lone red velvet chair rests to one side of the door.
